ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
c_compiler:
- gcc
c_compiler_version:
- '14'
c_stdlib:
- sysroot
c_stdlib_version:
- '2.17'
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cxx_compiler:
- gxx
cxx_compiler_version:
- '14'
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
target_platform:
- linux-64
zip_keys:
- - c_compiler_version
  - cxx_compiler_version

about.summary: Small Toolbox for Kriging (Gaussian process modeling, design of experiments)

build.script:
tar -czf ${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz ${{ name }}
octave -W -H --eval "pkg install -global -verbose ${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz"

mkdir -p $PREFIX/bin
cp $RECIPE_DIR/post-link.sh $PREFIX/bin/.octave-${{ name }}-post-link.sh
chmod +x $PREFIX/bin/.octave-${{ name }}-post-link.sh

tests.script:
octave -W -H --eval "\
  pkg list; \
  pkg load stk; \
  disp('stk loaded') \
"

about.summary: Small Toolbox for Kriging (Gaussian process modeling, design of experiments)

build.script:
tar -czf ${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz ${{ name }}
octave -W -H --eval "pkg install -global -verbose ${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz"

mkdir -p $PREFIX/bin
cp $RECIPE_DIR/post-link.sh $PREFIX/bin/.octave-${{ name }}-post-link.sh
chmod +x $PREFIX/bin/.octave-${{ name }}-post-link.sh

tests.script:
octave -W -H --eval "\
  pkg list; \
  pkg load stk; \
  disp('stk loaded') \
"

name: octave-stk
raw_meta_yaml:
context:
  name: stk
  version: "2.8.1"

package:
  name: octave-${{ name }}
  version: ${{ version }}

source:
  url: https://github.com/stk-kriging/stk/releases/download/${{ version }}/stk-${{ version }}-octpkg.tar.gz
  sha256: c138ccf4b51c0bc0448f74cdc40cfcefb2ea26fba8c5652c7bd3c86685869c85
  target_directory: ${{ name }}

build:
  number: 0
  skip:
    - if: win or osx
      then: true
  script: |
    tar -czf ${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz ${{ name }}
    octave -W -H --eval "pkg install -global -verbose ${{ name }}-${{ version }}.tar.gz"

    mkdir -p $PREFIX/bin
    cp $RECIPE_DIR/post-link.sh $PREFIX/bin/.octave-${{ name }}-post-link.sh
    chmod +x $PREFIX/bin/.octave-${{ name }}-post-link.sh

requirements:
  build:
    - ${{ compiler('c') }}
    - ${{ stdlib('c') }}
    - ${{ compiler('cxx') }}
    - make
  host:
    - octave >=4.0.1
  run:
    - octave >=4.0.1

tests:
  - script: |
      octave -W -H --eval "\
        pkg list; \
        pkg load stk; \
        disp('stk loaded') \
      "

about:
  homepage: https://github.com/stk-kriging/stk
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_file: stk/COPYING
  summary: Small Toolbox for Kriging (Gaussian process modeling, design of experiments)

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - arjxn-py
